translations: vt.使……非国有化；使……失去独立国地位；剥夺……的国籍（denationalize 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: The prospect of denationalizing currency and surrendering control over a fundamental tool of statecraft — currency valuation — was daunting to the member states of the European Community (ec).
sentences.translation: 去国化货币和把货币估值这一治国重要手段的控制权交出去的前景令欧共体成员国甚感气馁。
